page.title: 20PLAYTIME GAMES
page.content: {1)}HOPSCOTCH (using a flat stone) The idea is to throw the stone on to no.1 and miss no.1 out on the way and pick it up on the way back.Then do the same with the rest of the numbers up to 6. {2)}SHIRLEY TEMPLE I'm Shirley Temple with curly curly hair got two dimples skirts up in the air,Climb on the table do the Cats cradle I'm Shirley Temple the girl with curly hair,Oh,Saloony saloony it's got to be saloony,Hands up here skirts up there it's got to be saloony! {3)}MADE UP GAMES WITH A FOOTBALL SQUASH VOLLEYS PASS & SHOOT HEAD & CATCH DODGING TEAM GAMES {4)}MARBLES WITH GLASS MARBLES You score by hitting the big marble in the middle.
